title: 27 26 27 "Here We Go A Ghin""Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Gin!"Transliteration: "Reitetsu Hijō no Kijin Kaizoku Kantai Sōchō Gin" (Japanese:冷徹非情の鬼人·海賊艦隊総隊長ギン) Kōnosuke Uda Junki Takegami 314.2 May 31, 2000(2000-05-31)[51] March 26, 2005[52]
transformers_text: 27 26 27 Here We Go A Gh in Cool headed Cold hearted Demon Pirate Fleet Chief Commander G in Transliteration Rei tetsu Hi j no Ki j in Kai z oku Kant a i S ch G in Japanese K no suke Uda Junk i Take gam i 314 2 May 31 2000 2000 05 31 51 March 26 2005 52 Gh in finishes off Pearl claiming that he wants to kill Sanji himself A lengthy battle ensues but Gh in eventually gains the upper hand after Sanji breaks his ribs G in however comes to terms with himself realizing he does not have the strength to kill the man who saved him from malnutrition He then begs Krieg to leave the Bara tie alone but Krieg is disgusted with this show of emotion Because of this Gh in is no longer a member of the Krieg pirates and Krieg decides to have him executed He then pulls off one of his shoulder pads attaches it to his hand and it turns into a launcher for one of his deadliest weapons the MH 5 Poison Gas Bomb Even the Krieg pirates are shocked at this means of execution and are quick to put on their masks except G in who throws his in the water The Bara tie chefs swim away while Patty and Carne run inside with Zef f Luffy attempts to make a beeline for Krieg but is thrown back by the Needle Gun concealed in the launcher shoulder pad Krieg fires the MH 5 while Luffy steals two masks from two Krieg pirates and throws them to Sanji and G in He turns round to get another for himself but the pirates have vanished out to sea and he begins to panic The MH 5 explodes
